data.text: @Manp1809 Hi Manpreet, thank you so much for sending this feedback along, we're so happy to hear it! You made our day and thank you for appreciating our staff, they will be delighted to know about the same. Hope to see you onboard soon.
RT @Manp1809: @GoFirstairways tbh, never liked much bt starting today it's my fav coz of the customer service, thanks to Bglr traffic, got…
